scenario.title: User with no profile sends optin keyword with active subscription with free week

Given.step: Edit campaign "TelekomCampaign" begin on "10/10/2015 22:23:15" and ends on "10/11/2027 22:23:15" with langCode "sq"

Edit subscription "PersonalitySubscription" with id "PersonalitySubscription" starts on "01/01/2015 00:00:00" and ends on "01/01/2020 00:00:00" with "7" free days and welcome message from free shorcode

When.step: User sends sms with input "YES" to free short code

Then.step: User has profile
User has subscription profile
Sms is being processed by the "SUBSCRIBE" request
User receives the "SUBSCRIPTION_WELCOME" reply from free short code
User receives the following texts/response types from free short code ordered by event time:

Edit subscription "PersonalitySubscription" with id "PersonalitySubscription" starts on "01/01/2015 00:00:00" and ends on "01/01/2020 00:00:00" with "7" free days and welcome message from free shorcode
User sends sms with input "YES" to free short code

Inactive subscription "PersonalitySubscription" with id "PersonalitySubscription" starts on "01/01/2015 00:00:00" and ends on "01/01/2020 00:00:00" with "0" free days and welcome message from free shorcode
User sends sms with input "HELP" to free short code
User receives the "INVALID_REQUEST" reply from free short code
User receives the "invalid_request" text from free short code for "INVALID_REQUEST" reply
User does not get charged for the sms

scenario.title: User with profile sends optin keyword with active subscription which starts in the future

Given.step: Edit campaign "TelekomCampaign" begin on "10/10/2015 22:23:15" and ends on "10/11/2027 22:23:15" with langCode "sq"

Edit subscription "PersonalitySubscription" with id "PersonalitySubscription" starts on "01/01/2015 00:00:00" and ends on "01/01/2020 00:00:00" with "7" free days and welcome message from free shorcode

Edit subscription "PersonalitySubscription" with id "PersonalitySubscription" starts on "01/01/2020 00:00:00" and ends on "01/01/2021 00:00:00" with "7" free days and welcome message from free shorcode

When.step: User sends sms with input "YES" to free short code

Then.step: User has profile
User is unsubscribed in subscription profile
Sms is being processed by the "PRE_LAUNCH" request
User receives the "RESPONSE_SUBSCRIPTION_SERVICE" reply from free short code
User receives the following texts/response types from free short code ordered by event time:
